## LoadingProgressIndicatorProps.shouldBeVisibleBeforeFirstTick property

Should the loading indicator be visible before the first tick? (default: false)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldBeVisibleBeforeFirstTick?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

It may be preferable to hide the loading indicator before the first tick if thereâ€™s a reasonable chance loading will be complete in less than tickDuration.
